content: One idea that Dems and Reps might come together around is using the federal employee system, FEHBP. Rural areas and 10+ small states have monopoly insurance markets so the exchanges will not work. FEHBP has many health plans in all 50 states, scale with 8 million insurees, simple and low cost administration with OPM and 40 years of experience. Best of all there is a bill proposed by Rep. Cong. Issa to do this. This gives Republicans the cover the need.
